title: BRIEF-Zeder Says HY Recurring HEPS Will Be Between 3.3 Cents And 3.9 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Zeder Says HY Recurring HEPS Will Be Between 3.3 Cents And 3.9 Cents

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 03, 2019 08:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Zeder Says HY Recurring HEPS Will Be Between 3.3 Cents And 3.9 Cents Oct 3 (Reuters) - Zeder Investments Ltd : * TRADING STATEMENT, SUM-OF-THE-PARTS ("SOTP") VALUE AND RECURRING HEADLINE EARNINGS * HY RECURRING HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL BE BETWEEN 3.3 CENTS AND 3.9 CENTS * HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL BE BETWEEN 2.0 CENTS AND 2.8 CENTS * HY ATTRIBUTABLE EARNINGS PER SHARE WILL BE BETWEEN 25.3 CENTS AND 26.3 CENTS * HY ATTRIBUTABLE EPS FELL MAINLY DUE TO REVERSAL OF NON-HEADLINE IMPAIRMENT CHARGE ON CO'S ASSOCIATE INVESTMENT IN PIONEER FOODS

BRIEF-Zeder Says HY Recurring HEPS Will Be Between 3.3 Cents And 3.9 Cents
description: BRIEF-Zeder Says HY Recurring HEPS Will Be Between 3.3 Cents And 3.9 Cents
